eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine
Class AdvanceCompiler<T,X extends eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.inference.Type,C>

java.lang.Object
  eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.AdvanceCompiler<T,X,C>
Type Parameters:
T - the runtime type of the dataflow
X - the type system type
C - the runtime context
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceFlowCompiler<T,X,C>, AdvanceFlowExecutor
public final class AdvanceCompiler<T,X extends eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.inference.Type,C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceFlowCompiler<T,X,C>, AdvanceFlowExecutor

The ADVANCE block compiler which turns the the flow description into runnable advance blocks.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.06.27.

findGlobalOutput

protected boolean findGlobalOutput(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.Block<T,X,C> block,
                                   java.lang.String port,
                                   java.lang.String globalIn)
Check if a the blocks output parameter is wired to a global output port.

Parameters:
block - the block where to start the search
port - the output port name
globalIn - the global port name at the end.
Returns:
true if the block and port leads into the given global output.

findGlobalInput

protected boolean findGlobalInput(eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.Block<T,X,C> block,
                                  java.lang.String port,
                                  java.lang.String globalIn)
Check if the block's input parameter is wired to a global input port by traversing the graph of bindings.

Parameters:
block - the block to test
port - the input port name on the block
globalIn - the id of the global input port
Returns:
true if the given port on the block points to the given global input
